DarkestMod:BandanaRelic.NAME: Bull's Eye Bandana.
DarkestMod:BandanaRelic.FLAVOR: Shoot, bandage and pillage: the dancing steps of war.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 4th turn apply Marked to ALL enemies.

DarkestMod:BeserkRelic.NAME: Berserk Mask.
DarkestMod:BeserkRelic.FLAVOR: This man understands that adversity and existence are one and the same.
DESCRIPTIONS: 20% Increased Virtue chance when afflicted.

DarkestMod:BossStressUpgradeRelic.NAME: Stressed Meter.
DarkestMod:BossStressUpgradeRelic.FLAVOR: The human mind - fragile like a robin's egg.
DESCRIPTIONS: 15 Stress reduced when entering a rest site.Tracks Stress between rounds.

DarkestMod:BlasphemousVialRelic.NAME: Blasphemous Vial
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacks deal damage also apply 1 Blight to that enemy.

DarkestMod:CandleRelic.NAME: Candle of Life.
DarkestMod:CandleRelic.FLAVOR: She searches where others will not go... and sees what others will not see.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn Gain 10 Block and 2 max HP.

DarkestMod:DemonsRelic.NAME: Demons Cauldron
DarkestMod:DemonsRelic.FLAVOR: To fight the abyss, one must know it..
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 2 times you shuffle your draw pile, gain 1 Strength and add a Curse: The Runs into the deck.

DarkestMod:GuardianRelic.NAME: Guardian's Shield.
DarkestMod:GuardianRelic.FLAVOR: The raw strength of youth may be spent, but his eyes hold the secrets of a hundred campaigns.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 3rd turn Gain 5 Plated Armour.

DarkestMod:GunslingerRelic.NAME: Gunslinger's Buckle.
DarkestMod:GunslingerRelic.FLAVOR: Elusive, evasive, persistent. Righteous traits for a rogue.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a Tracking Shot into your hand.

DarkestMod:HairpinRelic.NAME: Hell's Hairpin.
DarkestMod:HairpinRelic.FLAVOR: Barbaric rage and unrelenting savagery make for a powerful ally.
DESCRIPTIONS: When the Light Level is -5 or less Gain 1 energy.

DarkestMod:HolyRelic.NAME: Holy Orders.
DarkestMod:HolyRelic.FLAVOR: A mighty sword-arm anchored by a holy purpose. A zealous warrior.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat right click to remove all debuffs.

DarkestMod:LuckyDiceRelic.NAME: Critical Dice
DarkestMod:LuckyDiceRelic.FLAVOR: He will be laughing still... at the end.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat right click to discard any number of cards then draw that many.

DarkestMod:PunishmentsHoodRelic.NAME: Punishment's Hood
DarkestMod:PunishmentsHoodRelic.FLAVOR: Great is the weapon that cuts on its own!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever attacked apply 1 bleed to ALL enemies .

DarkestMod:RaiderRelic.NAME: Raider's Talisman.
DarkestMod:RaiderRelic.FLAVOR: To those with a keen eye, gold gleams like a dagger's point.
DESCRIPTIONS: The 2nd time you play an attack card remove Block from ALL enemies.

DarkestMod:RestrainingRelic.NAME: Restraining Padlock.
DarkestMod:RestrainingRelic.FLAVOR: Tortured and reclusive... this man is more dangerous than he seems...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn gain 2 temporary Strength.

DarkestMod:SpikedRelic.NAME: Spiked Collar.
DarkestMod:SpikedRelic.FLAVOR: A lawman and his faithful beast. A bond forged by battle and bloodshed.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Riposte.

DarkestMod:StressRelic.NAME: Stress Meter.
DarkestMod:StressRelic.FLAVOR: Injury and despondence set the stage for heroism... or cowardice..
DESCRIPTIONS: Tracks Stress between rounds.

DarkestMod:TorchLightRelic.NAME: Torch Light
DarkestMod:TorchLightRelic.FLAVOR: The way is lit. The path is clear. We require only the strength to follow it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat gain #b1 Light .

DarkestMod:TomeRelic.NAME: Tome of Holy Healing
DarkestMod:TomeRelic.FLAVOR: The wounds of war can be healed, but never hidden.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal for 15 upon pickup. Start each combat with +2 Light.

DarkestMod:VenomousRelic.NAME: Venomous Vial.
DarkestMod:VenomousRelic.FLAVOR: A sharper sword, a stronger shield. Anything to prolong a soldier's life.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Blight to ALL enemies.

DarkestMod:WoundingRelic.NAME: Wounding Helmet.
DESCRIPTIONS: Shovels do 4 more damage

DarkestMod:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Energy Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] .

DarkestMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

DarkestMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
DarkestMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] NL #yEvoke your rightmost Orb.
YOU ARE MINE!

DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
